input.sentences: on easter | the family got everything together to decorate eggs .
they used many different things to color the eggs and make designs on them .
they had a special rack to dry and display the eggs .
they used stencils | paints and crayons to make faces and other designs on the eggs .
when they were done | they stood back to admire their `` egg tree ! ''
output.sentences: Like most families our family painted eggs for Easter.
We tried not to use the same color twice and added unique designs to the eggs.
I bought a special rack to display our artful eggs.
To decorate the eggs we used many stencils and paints.
Finally finished our egg tree stood proudly displaying our creativity.
